ability.name: Slaughter
ability.description: * When using Laughter, you may instead: * Take 1 Corruption Point * Play the Fool, but only one Minor Arcana card on Laughter * Remove the Minor Arcana card from your deck permanently. * Deal Ranged Magic Damage equal to 10 times the numerical value of the card so-removed. * You may not use Slaughter again this Day.
ability.flavor: Nobody finds the violence funny but you.
